title: Apple OS X AudioAUUC Integer Overflow Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of Apple OS X. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a malicious page or open a malicious file.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of the AudioAUUC kernel extension. The issue lies in the failure to check for an integer overflow condition when allocating a buffer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code within the context of the kernel.
addtionnal_details: Apple has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT207170
timeline:
2016-04-26 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2016-09-20 - Coordinated public release of advisory
